videos.description: Texas guard Matt Coleman III drives hard to the paint and floats a pretty alley-oop pass to Jericho Sims, who rises up for the flush.
videos.headline: Texas converts on perfect alley-oop

videos.description: Kerwin Roach II boards an Arkansas miss, pushes the rock and whips a pass to Courtney Ramey, who glides to the rack and slams the jam.
videos.headline: Longhorns run lightning fast break for breakaway jam

videos.description: Arkansas forward Daniel Gafford tries tapping in his own miss, falls to the floor, and is stepped on by his teammate.
videos.headline: Gafford accidentally stomped on by teammate

videos.description: Andrew Jones sits down with Jay Williams to reflect on his defeated-battle with cancer and how Texas basketball always kept his spirits high.
videos.headline: Jones wants to 'inspire' after beating cancer

videos.description: Jalen Harris fends off a double team, slices to the paint and drops a pretty bounce pass to Daniel Gafford, who leaps and drops the two-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Gafford rips rim on 2-handed slam

videos.description: Down by 3 and time winding down, Texas guard Kerwin Roach II keeps it himself, squares up and buries a clutch 3 to knot the score at 63-63 and send the game to OT.
videos.headline: Roach sends game to OT with last-second 3
